title: Vivint Smart Home
summary: Control your Vivint Smart Home with the next generation Vivint App.
description: The Vivint Smart Home app is a complete smart home control system that connects doorbell cameras, security cameras, smart thermostats, door & window sensors, smoke detectors, and more into a single user interface. Our simple, intuitive app eliminates the need to switch between different home control apps or walk through the house flipping switches by hand. With the Vivint Smart Home app, you get to live more and manage less.Note: Vivint SkyControl panel and service subscription required. Call 877.788.2697 for free installation.With the Vivint Smart Home app, you can:· Arm home security systems from bed to sleep more peacefully· Optimize climate controls for comfort and energy savings at once· See and speak with front-door visitors from anywhere with Vivint Doorbell Camera· Remotely lock and unlock doors for visitors with Vivint Smart Locks· Get mobile notifications when garage or front door are left open· Operate garage doors from anywhere within cellular or Wi-Fi networks· Make sure kids arrive home from school with the Ping indoor cameraNote: If you're looking for the app that supports the Vivint Go!Control Panel, search and download the "Vivint Classic" app.
descriptionHTML:
The Vivint Smart Home app is a complete smart home control system that connects doorbell cameras, security cameras, smart thermostats, door & window sensors, smoke detectors, and more into a single user interface. Our simple, intuitive app eliminates the need to switch between different home control apps or walk through the house flipping switches by hand. With the Vivint Smart Home app, you get to live more and manage less.

Note: Vivint SkyControl panel and service subscription required. Call 877.788.2697 for free installation.

With the Vivint Smart Home app, you can:

· Arm home security systems from bed to sleep more peacefully

· Optimize climate controls for comfort and energy savings at once

· See and speak with front-door visitors from anywhere with Vivint Doorbell Camera

· Remotely lock and unlock doors for visitors with Vivint Smart Locks

· Get mobile notifications when garage or front door are left open

· Operate garage doors from anywhere within cellular or Wi-Fi networks

· Make sure kids arrive home from school with the Ping indoor camera

Note: If you're looking for the app that supports the Vivint Go!Control Panel, search and download the "Vivint Classic" app.
comments: Convenient, easy to use, and quality. No issues so far and I really enjoy it.
Best security people can have. See them before they see you.

It was a rough start.... In the begin, which was approx 4 years ago. The systems had a lot of issues that needed to be worked out. But after the improvements that Vivint had made, our home security system is flawless. I'm am very please with the company as a whole. Thank you Driving for the peace of mind.
recentChanges: This release makes it much easier to quickly understand the state of your system. The app will help you stay on top of what's happening at home by letting you know whenever a device needs attention (low batteries, loose cover, etc.). For most situations, step-by-step instructions will be provided to easily resolve the issue.
For app performance and stability, the release also includes bug fixes and improvements. If you have feedback, please contact us at android@vivint.com.
